text: The 2007 UIV Cup Rotterdam was held from 5 to 9 January 2007 in Rotterdam Ahoy Sportpaleis in Rotterdam. The event was scheduled together with the 2007 Six Days of Rotterdam. Eleven teams existing of under-23 riders challenged each other in a five-day madison event. ==Day 1== {| class="wikitable" !width="20px"|No. !width="200px"|Riders !width="40px"|Laps Walgien were injured and could not take part in the last race. As a result Kilian Moser and Thijs Bezemer rode together with the Schibli and Moser score. ==External links== * Official website UIV Cup Rotterdam UIV Cup 2007 UIV Cup Rotterdam
